title: letter_to_smithsonian
abstract:
January 18, 2008
The Honorable Cristián Samper, Acting Secretary
The Smithsonian Institution
1000 Jefferson Drive, SW
Washington, D.C. 20560
Dear Secretary Samper:
It was with great interest that I read of the recent initiative by the Library of Congress 
and Yahoo! to create The Commons, a collection of photographs with “no known re-
strictions” on the popular Flickr photo-sharing service.  
As Matt Raymond, the project director for the Library of Congress said in his blog: “As 
a communicator,
